name: The Maine Squeeze (Blueberry, Oat, and Ginger Smoothie)
description: Adding a little cooked oatmeal to this blueberrry smoothie means it has serious staying power.
recipeIngredient: 2 cups unsweetened soy milk, such as Silk, or dairy milk
1 cup cooked, cooled steel cut oats (see note)
1/4 teaspoon zest and 2 teaspoons juice from 1 lemon

recipeInstructions.text: Place soy milk, blueberries, steel cut oats, honey, ginger, vanilla, lemon zest, and lemon juice into blender. Blend until smooth, about 40 seconds. Serve.
